ai-patthana16.44:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.44:0.3_0: should apply themselves to a ball of food.
ai-patthana16.44:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of inside.
ai-patthana16.44:1.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the sake of externally.
ai-patthana16.44:2.1_0: Because of this thing that doesn’t give rise to the cause.
ai-patthana16.44:2.1_1: Neither sees the cause or condition for the reason.
